GSD.description:
ARM: 9214/1: alignment: advance IT state after emulating Thumb instruction

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.253 by commit b1ef24a9ebdd1e98c11b2d36cb873576bc23aa30. For more details please see the references link.
